errors.error_description: Changed package name from 'intake' to 'intake-core' in conda installation command, which is an incorrect package name
Moved 'Install intake using pip install -e .' step before 'Use pytest to run tests' which creates incorrect logical order
correction_candidates: Move 'Install intake using pip install -e .' after 'Use pytest to run tests'
Move 'Install intake using pip install -e .' before 'Create development Python environment'
Move 'Install intake using pip install -e .' after 'Create development Python environment' and before 'Use pytest to run tests'
Remove the 'Install intake using pip install -e .' step entirely
errors.golden_answer: Move 'Install intake using pip install -e .' after 'Create development Python environment' and before 'Use pytest to run tests'
